714eb42c-71f8-4470-af67-7b4d18af8c6b.name: Sharp Claws (antlers on arms)
714eb42c-71f8-4470-af67-7b4d18af8c6b.notes: Trimmed down outside of Gurvin society.

e744e706-42fc-4063-b44c-e6d70505153d.name: Incurious
e744e706-42fc-4063-b44c-e6d70505153d.notes: Make a self-control roll when confronted with something strange. If you fail, you ignore it!

b66b92f1-ff10-4724-b3fa-361540a4c7b9.name: Hidebound
b66b92f1-ff10-4724-b3fa-361540a4c7b9.notes: -2 penalty on any task that requires creativity or invention, including most rolls against Artist skill, all Engineer rolls for new inventions, and all skill rolls made to use the Gadgeteer advantage.
